item.title: I'm sorry I have no clue
item.dc:creator: @Aftermath_961 Aftermath
item.description:
@Aftermath_961 wrote:

Hmm, that’s my tutorial.

public void teleall()
{
   for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players)
   {
      if(p != null)
      {
         client person = (client)p;
         if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null"))
         {
            person.teleportToX = absX;
            person.teleportToY = absY;
            person.heightLevel = heightLevel;
            person.sendMessage("Mass teleport to " + playerName);
            person.updateRequired = true;
            person.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
            updateRequired = true;
            appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
         }
      }
   }
}

Anyway. This goes in client.java. Find anywhere in there where it said public something.
Copy and paste it above that.

For this one, find anything that says if(command.startsWith and paste this above it.

if (command.startsWith("alltome") && playerRights >= 2) {
   teleall();
}

item.title: I'm sorry I have no clue
item.dc:creator: @Dharok_Owns Dharok Owns
item.description:
@Dharok_Owns wrote:

where to copy and paste this. I am sorry this is my first time ever! So could someone please tell me where/how to do this!

Code:
public void teleall()
{
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players)
{
if(p != null)
{
client person = (client)p;
if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != “null”))
{
person.teleportToX = absX;
person.teleportToY = absY;
person.heightLevel = heightLevel;
person.sendMessage("Mass teleport to " + playerName);
person.updateRequired = true;
person.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
}
}
}

This is the command, put this anywhere inside of customCommand.

Code:
if (command.startsWith(“alltome”) && playerRights >= 2) {
teleall();
}

Also if this is in the incorrect forums I am sorry just tell me.

Read full topic
